scripts.text: He's folding some clothes.
He's looking into a laundry cart.
He's removing some clothes from hangers.
He's standing in front of a washing machine.
The man is leaning against a doorway.
The man is opening up a package.
One of the women is plugging in a printer.
scripts.translation: 여성 중 한 명이 프린터를 꽂고 있다.

scripts.text: One of the women is wearing glasses.
scripts.translation: 여성 중 한 명이 안경을 쓰고 있다.

scripts.text: She is attaching price tags to some merchandise.
She is piling up some boxes.
She is holding up some fruit.
She is throwing away a plastic bag.
A jacket has been placed on the ground.
A man is watering some flowers.
A garden has been planted outside of a building.
A man is putting some tools in a toolbox.
scripts.translation: 남자가 공구 상자에 공구를 넣고 있다.

scripts.text: Some chairs are stacked in the corner.
Some light fixtures are mounted on the walls.
Some tables are covered with tablecloths.
Some furniture is on display in a window.
One of the employees is walking with an empty tray.
scripts.translation: 직원들 중 한 명이 빈 쟁반을 들고 걸어가고 있다.

scripts.text: One of the employees is taping signs to a board.
scripts.translation: 직원들 중 한 명이 게시판에 표지판을 테이프로 붙이고 있다.

scripts.text: One of the employees is carrying a pair of scissors.
scripts.translation: 직원들 중 한 명이 가위를 들고 있다.

scripts.text: One of the employees is hanging an apron on a hook.
scripts.translation: 직원들 중 한 명이 앞치마를 고리에 걸고 있다.
